import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Directives_Assignment'; isShow = false; count=0; logclick:number[]=[]; toggle(){ this.isShow=!this.isShow; this.count+=1; this.logclick.push(this.count); } }
